    • Button

      public Button​(int x, int y, int w, int h, Text text, java.lang.Boolean box)
      Constructor of the Button class.
      Parameters:
      x - - x coordinate of this Button
      y - - y coordinate of this Button
      w - - width of this Button
      h - - height of this Button
      text - - content of this Button
      box - - boolean: if true, a surrounding box will be drawn
